metadata.title: USN-6278-2 -- .NET vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-6278-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in .NET. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that .NET did properly handle the execution of  certain commands. An attacker could possibly use this issue to  achieve remote code execution. (CVE-2023-35390)    Benoit Foucher discovered that .NET did not properly implement the  QUIC stream limit in HTTP/3. An attacker could possibly use this  issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2023-38178)    It was discovered that .NET did not properly handle the disconnection  of potentially malicious clients interfacing with a Kestrel server. An  attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  (CVE-2023-38180)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6278-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet6 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.121-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet7 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.110-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required
